sentences.en: Following a day of medical research, the conference focused on educational practices.
sentences.cn: 在就医学研究专题讨论一天后，会议接下来的主题集中在教学实践上。

sentences.en: He collapsed following a vigorous exercise session at his home.
sentences.cn: 在家剧烈运动了一阵后他突然昏倒了。

sentences.en: He led the way to the lift. Fox played along, following him.
sentences.cn: 他朝电梯走去，福克斯只得紧随其后。

sentences.en: He was sick in the evening, but the following day he was better.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上他生病了，但第二天就好一些了。

sentences.en: I'm following up a few things that might dovetail.
sentences.cn: 我正追查几件可能互相关联的事。

sentences.en: In case anyone was following me, I made an elaborate detour.
sentences.cn: 为了防止有人跟踪我，我特地绕了弯路。

sentences.en: Police say they have arrested twenty people following the disturbances.
sentences.cn: 警方说骚乱发生后他们已逮捕了20人。

sentences.en: Send your details on a card to the following address.
sentences.cn: 在明信片上写明你的近况寄到下面的地址。

sentences.en: The athlete received a two-year suspension following a positive drug test.
sentences.cn: 该运动员因尿检结果呈阳性而被停赛两年。

sentences.en: The following day the picture appeared on the front pages of every newspaper in the world.
sentences.cn: 次日，照片出现在世界各地报纸的头版。

sentences.en: The following information was correct at time of going to press.
sentences.cn: 下列信息在付印时准确无误。

sentences.en: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
sentences.cn: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

sentences.en: The following year Parliament voted to abolish the death penalty for murder.
sentences.cn: 议会于翌年表决对谋杀罪废除死刑。

sentences.en: The following year she joined the Royal Opera House.
sentences.cn: 次年她加入了皇家歌剧院。

sentences.en: The rate of disconnections following non-payment of water charges is rising.
sentences.cn: 不缴水费引起的断水的比率正在上升。

sentences.en: The service is being expanded following the success of a pilot scheme.
sentences.cn: 在试验性方案获得成功后，这项服务正在推广中。

sentences.en: There is tension in the region following the killing of seven civilians.
sentences.cn: 随着7名平民被杀害，该地区局势紧张起来。

sentences.en: We went to dinner the following Monday evening.
sentences.cn: 在接下来的那个周一晚上我们一起共进晚餐。

sentences.en: Write down the following information: name of product, type, date purchased and price.
sentences.cn: 写下以下信息：产品名称、型号、购买日期和价格。
